video_wizard.enter_topic_instructions: Simply enter your video topic into the box below, or our AI will a topic for you!
video_wizard.type_your_idea: Type your idea or let us pick one for you
video_wizard.choose_monetization: Choose How You Want To Earn With Your Video
video_wizard.generate_video_script: GENERATE My Video Script, Title, & Everything Else!

video_editor.make_video_your_own_title: Let's Make The Video Your Own
video_editor.edit_video_context: Go through your new video context and make any edits to create your script!

error_message.complete_forms: Please complete these forms before you move on.

video_option.title: Use Our AI Generated Voice or Record Your Own
video_option.description: Pick a voice. We'll take care of the audio for you or you can upload your own below.
video_option.audio_not_supported_message: Your browser does not support the audio element.
video_option.edit_in_descript_title: Almost Done, Put It All Together With Descript
video_option.edit_in_descript_description: Now that you have downloaded your AI narration or created your own, it's time to put it all together with video.

media_selection_form.review_video_button: Review Your Video & Post To Youtube

voice_selection_dropdown.audio_not_supported_message: Your browser does not support the audio element.

pages.page_not_found: The page you are looking for was not found.
pages.page_temporarily_unavailable: The page you are looking for is temporarily unavailable.

video_duration.very_short_description: Ultra-concise format focusing on a single key point, perfect for rapid consumption and easy sharing.
video_duration.short_description: Quick, engaging content that's easy to consume, ideal for viewers with short attention spans or seeking fast information. Short format focusing on a single key point, perfect for rapid consumption and easy sharing.
video_duration.medium_description: A more in-depth look at a topic, ideal for viewers seeking more information or a deeper understanding of a topic.  Provides a balance between depth and brevity, allowing for detailed explanations without overwhelming the audience.
video_duration.long_description: A deep dive into a topic, ideal for viewers seeking a comprehensive understanding of a topic.  Provides a balance between depth and brevity, allowing for detailed explanations without overwhelming the audience.
video_duration.very_long_description: A comprehensive look at a topic, ideal for viewers seeking a comprehensive understanding of a topic.  Provides a balance between depth and brevity, allowing for detailed explanations without overwhelming the audience.
video_duration.brief_introduction: Set the stage for the problem or topic
video_duration.preview_key_points: Preview the sections and key points to be covered
video_duration.concise_explanation: Concise explanation of the key point or main idea
video_duration.deliver_context: Deliver context and background for understanding
video_duration.highlight_key_steps: Highlight the most critical points or steps
video_duration.use_examples: Support your argument with examples and evidence
video_duration.organize_subtext: Organize content into relevant subtopics or steps
video_duration.in_depth_explanation: Explore the topic or problem in-depth
video_duration.multiple_examples: Present multiple examples and supporting evidence
video_duration.practical_tip: Share a practical, valuable tip or insight for viewers
video_duration.relevant_cases: Share pertinent case studies or real-life examples to reinforce your points
video_duration.relevant_application: Demonstrate the practical application of the concepts discussed
video_duration.include_insights: Give samples of insights from experts in the field to provide additional perspectives
video_duration.address_questions: Address common questions or misconceptions related to the topic
video_duration.call_to_action: Prompt engagement with a call-to-action (e.g., subscribe, like, or comment)
video_duration.init_header: Select The Duration For Your Video
video_duration.init_description: Each video needs a specific duration present the information.  It needs to be captivating and engaging.  Remember to align the style of your video with proven trends in your selected niche

video_style.init_header: Select The Niche For Your Video
video_style.init_description: Each video needs a specific style and tone to present the information.  It needs to be captivating and engaging.  Remember to align the style of your video with proven trends in your selected niche
video_style.top_5_description: This niche involves creating videos that present interesting, surprising, or obscure information in a list format. The content can span various topics, such as history, science, or pop culture. Faceless videos work well in this niche since the focus is on the information and visuals rather than the presenter. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and affiliate marketing.
video_style.psychology_description: Creators in this niche may share their own experiences and insights or provide expert advice and guidance through interviews, Q&As, and informative videos. This niche has a wide audience appeal, as people are always looking for ways to better understand themselves and others.
video_style.story_telling_description: This niche involves creating videos that tell a story. The content can span various topics, such as history, science, or pop culture. Faceless videos work well in this niche since the focus is on the information and visuals rather than the presenter. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and affiliate marketing.
video_style.cooking_description: This niche involves creating videos that teach viewers how to cook or bake. The content can span various topics, such as history, science, or pop culture. Faceless videos work well in this niche since the focus is on the information and visuals rather than the presenter. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and affiliate marketing.
video_style.hacks_description: This niche involves creating videos that teach viewers how to do something more efficiently. The content can span various topics, such as history, science, or pop culture. Faceless videos work well in this niche since the focus is on the information and visuals rather than the presenter. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and affiliate marketing.
video_style.movie_recap_description: Summarize films and games from various genres using an AI-generated voice, providing engaging and informative content. Explore deeper themes, motifs, and symbolism, enhancing viewers' understanding and appreciation of the message.
video_style.language_description: Use AI to create lessons and translate foreign langugages. Millions of users tune in every day to learn new languages. This could start off with basic phrases, pronunciation, words, and grammar. Lessons can be bite-sized 2-5 mins clips. To take it a little more outside the box body language is also technically a language.
video_style.virtual_reality_description: This niche involves creating videos that showcase virtual reality games and experiences. The videos can be presented in a first-person point of view, and can include commentary or reactions from the creator. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and affiliate marketing.

music_style.covers_description: This niche involves creating videos where the creator performs covers or remixes of popular songs. The videos can be presented in a variety of styles, such as acoustic, a cappella, or instrumental. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and digital downloads.
music_style.music_production_description: This niche involves creating videos that teach viewers how to produce music, including tutorials on software, techniques, and tips. The videos can be presented in a how-to or walkthrough format, and can include animations or visuals to enhance the demonstration. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and digital downloads.
music_style.music_reviews_description: This niche involves creating videos that provide critiques, reviews, or analysis of music and albums. The videos can be presented in a humorous, critical, or informative tone, and can include clips or footage from the original content. Creators can monetize through advertising, sponsorships, and affiliate marketing.

food_experiments.name: Food Experiments
food_experiments.description: This niche involves creating videos that explore unique, unexpected, or unusual food combinations or cooking techniques. The content can range from recipe demos to taste tests, and may appeal to viewers who enjoy cooking or trying new foods. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or creating and selling their own recipe books or products.

diy_life_hacks.name: DIY Life Hacks
diy_life_hacks.description: This niche involves creating videos that offer creative solutions to everyday problems or challenges, such as home organization, cleaning, or fashion hacks. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or by creating and selling their own products or courses.

sustainable_living.name: Sustainable Living
sustainable_living.description: This niche involves creating videos that focus on sustainable or eco-friendly living, such as zero-waste tips, green energy, or sustainable fashion. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or by creating and selling eco-friendly products or courses.

brain_teasers.name: Brain Teasers
brain_teasers.description: This niche involves creating videos that challenge viewers' minds with riddles, puzzles, or brain teasers. The content can range from simple math problems to complex logic puzzles, and may appeal to viewers who enjoy problem-solving or intellectual challenges. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or by creating and selling their own puzzle books or games.

pet_parenting.name: Pet Parenting
pet_parenting.description: This niche involves creating videos that offer advice, tips, and insights on pet care and pet parenting. The content can range from training tips to product reviews, and may appeal to viewers who are passionate about their pets. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or by creating and selling their own pet care products or courses.

minimalism.name: Minimalism
minimalism.description: This niche involves creating videos that focus on minimalism and simplifying life. The content can range from home organization to fashion and beauty, and may appeal to viewers who are interested in simplifying their lives and reducing clutter. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or by creating and selling their own minimalist products or courses.

art_history.name: Art History
art_history.description: This niche involves creating videos that explore different eras, styles, and movements in art history. The content can range from educational lectures to art critiques and may appeal to viewers who are interested in art history and culture. Creators can monetize through sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or by creating and selling their own art history courses or books.

beauty_tutorials_mature_skin.name: Beauty Tutorials for Mature Skin
beauty_tutorials_mature_skin.description: This niche is focused on providing beauty tips and tutorials specifically for mature skin. Creators in this niche often share tips and tricks for skincare, makeup, and hair care that are tailored to the needs of older viewers. Monetization can come from sponsorships, affiliate marketing, or merchandise sales.
